mapper.select: select id,title,logo from blog where id = #{id}
select a.no, a.name, a.description, a.reg_date, a.id, count(b.category_no) as categoryCnt from category a left join post b on a.no = b.category_no where id= #{id} group by a.no order by a.no desc;
select a.no, a.title, a.contents, a.reg_date as regDate, b.no as categoryNo, b.id from post a, category b where a.category_no = b.no and b.no = #{no};
select a.no, a.title, a.contents, a.reg_date as regDate, a.category_no as categoryNo, b.id from post a, category b where a.category_no = b.no and a.category_no=#{categoryNo} and a.no=#{postNo}
select min(no) from category where id=#{id}
